pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Tools for Helsinki Open Data // Tools for accessing various open data sources in the Helsinki region in Finland. Current data sources include the Real Estate Department (http://ptp.hel.fi/avoindata/), Service Map API (http://api.hel.fi/servicemap/v1/), Linked Events API (http://api.hel.fi/linkedevents/v0.1/), Helsinki Region Infoshare statistics API (https://dev.hel.fi/stats/).
